title: Brif Istri bɔt At na Spays - Ɔrbital Tɛmpl
heading: Brif Istri bɔt At na Spays
intro: Frɔm we dɛn bigin fɔ sɛn atifishal sataylayt fayn fayn wan insay 1957 , i pas tɛn tawzin sataylayt dɛn we dɔn kam rawnd di wɔl. Insay dis nyu tɛm, atis dɛn dɔn fɛn we fɔ mek dɛn praktis bɔku ɛn ɔta spɛs dɔn bi nyu kayn kanvas. Wit dat, fondamental kweshon dem abaut di politiks of spes eksploreshon don kom - no mata se plenti mo graun no don kova yet.

leonov.text: Di fɔs art wok we dɛn mek na di spes na wan drɔin we de sho aw di san de kɔmɔt oba di wɔl, we wan Rɔshian astronaut Alɛksi Liɔnov bin mek we i bin de na di Voskhod 2 insay 1965 .
leonov.caption: Di fɔs art we dɛn mek na di spes, ɛn di pensil dɛn we Alɛksi Liɔnov bin yuz fɔ drɔ am. Foto: Miusiɔm fɔ di Yuri Gagarin Kɔsmonaut Trenin Senta

moonMuseum.paragraph1: Tri ia afta dat, Moon Museum , wan smɔl smɔl sɛramik plet we dɛn se bin land na di Mun wit tin dɛn we siks pan di big big atis dɛn na Amɛrika da tɛm de rayt: Rɔbɔt Rauschenberg , Devid Novros , Jɔn Chamberlain , Claes Oldenburg , Forrest Myers ɛn Andy Warhol .
moonMuseum.caption1: Imej fɔ di Mun Miuzɛm frɔm di ɔrijinal Nyu Yɔk Tayms atikul. Di big an de mek di drɔin we Warhol bin dɔn mek nɔ klia.
moonMuseum.paragraph2: Warhol in provoketiv kɔntribyushɔn - ɔp lɛft - mek dis prɔjek bi chalenj fɔ kɔmyunikeshɔn midia da tɛm de.
moonMuseum.caption2: Di pikchɔ we di Nyu Yɔk Tayms bin pik fɔ pablish, wit di art wok we yu go si dɔŋ ya ɛn Andy Warhol in drɔin na di ɔp lɛft kɔna.

fallenAstronaut.text: Insay 1971 , wan smɔl smɔl aluminiɔm skapul we tan lɛk mɔtalman we dɛn kɔl Fallen Astronaut bin put am na di Mun we wan man we nem Devid Skɔt we de wok na di Apɔlɔs 15 bin put am na di Mun . Beljiɔm atis Pɔl Van Hoeydɔnk bin want, wit dis pies, fɔ mɛmba di astronauts ɛn cosmonauts we dɔn day insay di advansmɛnt fɔ spɛs ɛksplɔrɔshɔn.
fallenAstronaut.caption: We yu si di Kɔmɛmorativ plek we dɛn lɛf na di mun na Hadley-Apennine landin sayt.

pioneerVoyager.text: Insay di ia 1970 , di Pioneer Plaques ɛn di Voyager Probes ɔl tu bin mek nyu tin dɛn fɔ mek art na di spes. We dɛn bin de kɛr gold-anodized aluminiɔm plek dɛn wit vijual mɛsej frɔm di wɔl to ɛni ɔda spɛshal pɔsin we go fɛn am insay di fa fa tɛm, dɛn bin de sho mɔtalman layf insay in mɔs fondamental ɛlimɛnt dɛn.
pioneerVoyager.caption: Pioneer 10 ɛn 11 plek dɛn, we dɛn bin kɛr go na dip spes insay di 1970s.

dove.text: Insay 1990 , Brazil bin lɛf in mak na dis teritɔri wit DOVE/OSCAR-17 , we na wan fayn fayn amatɔ sataylayt we gɛt bɔku pawa fɔ rayt poem. Pan ɔl we di pɔsin we mek am nɔ bin tek insɛf as atis, i bin rili bi poem wok: i bin rikodɔ pikin dɛn vɔys we de aks fɔ pis ɛn transmit dɛn to pas tu tawzin redio amatɔ dɛn ɔlsay na di wɔl, ɛn chenj wan payɔnia CubeSat to wan kɔlektif sawnd wok.
dove.caption: DOVE/OSCAR-17, Brazil in poɛtik sataylayt we de transmit pikin dɛn vɔys fɔ mek pis de, 1990.

lastPictures.text: Insay 2012 , atis Trevor Paglen bin lanch "The Last Pictures" , wan maykro-ɛch disk we gɛt 100 foto dɛn we dɛn ataya to di Echostar XVI kɔmyunikeshɔn sataylayt insay jiosteshɔnal ɔbit. Dɛn mek am fɔ las fɔ bɔku bɔku ia, ɛn dɛn mek am fɔ las pas mɔtalman sivilizayshɔn as akiɔlɔjik tin fɔ di fa fa tɛm.
lastPictures.caption: Di Las Pikchɔ, we na wan maykro-ɛch disk we dɛn mek fɔ lɔng pas mɔtalman, bin bigin insay 2012.

ulises.text: Insay 2015 , di Colectivo Espacial Mexicano (Mexican Space Collective) bin lanch Ulises I , wan nanosatellite we dɛn bin kɔnsɛpt as kɔnsɛptwal ɔpra ɔnda di dayrɛkshɔn fɔ atis Juan José Díaz Infante Casasús . Dɛn bin kɛr di sataylayt go na di stratosfia pan wan balyɔn di tɛm we dɛn bin de du di Feria del Libro de Guadalajara. Dɛn mek am fɔ bɔn fɔ lɛk 4 awa so ɛn fɔ kam dɔŋ wit parachute.
ulises.caption: Ulises I, wan kɔnsɛptwal sataylayt ɔpra we Colectivo Espacial Mexicano mek.

artsat.text: Na insay 2014 dɛn bin lanch di fɔs sataylayt we jɔs tan lɛk atis. Di Yunivasiti ɔf Tɔkyo in ARTSAT-1 Invader projɛkt bin sɛn spatial data to di wɔl we dɛn bin de yuz fɔ mek art instɔleshɔn ɛn fɔ mek myuzik.
artsat.caption1: ARTSAT-1 Invader framework ɛn spay pat dɛn we bin lɛf na di wɔl.
artsat.caption2: mishɔn [SPACE x ART] − biyɔn Cosmologies ɛgzibishin we dɛn bin gɛt na di Miusiɔm fɔ Kɔntempɔray At Tɔkyo

kac.text: Brazilian ɛn Amɛrikan kɔntempɔral atis Eduardo Kac dɔn kɔntribyut to spɛs art tru kolaboreshɔn wit NASA ɛn SpaceX . In "Inner Telescope" ( 2017 ), we i mek wit Frɛnch astronaut Tɔmɔs Pɛskɛt , bin rilizɔt wan skapul we dɛn mek na di Intanɛshɔnal Spays Steshɔn .
kac.caption: Inna Tɛliskɔp na di Intanɛshɔnal Spays Steshɔn, we dɛn mek wit wan Frɛnch astronaut Tɔmɔs Pɛskɛt, 2017.

enoch.text: In 2018 , wan pasiv CubeSat we dɛn bil as art projɛkt bin lanch insay ɔbit. Na bahamian kɔnsɛptwal atis Tavares Strachan bin mek am, ɛn Inɔk gɛt wan 24-karat-gold kanopik jɔg wit wan bɔst fɔ di fɔs Afrikan-Amɛrikan astronaut, Rɔbɔt Ɛnri Lɔrɛns Juniɔ .
enoch.caption: ENOCH (displei yunit), 2015-2017. R Tavares Strachan, foto l Miusiɔm Asosiet dɛn/LACMA.

orbitalReflector.text: Insay da sem ia de, dɛn bin lanch bak Trevor Paglen in Orbital Reflector as skapul we dɛn put insay wan CubeSat we nɔ de wok. Di wok na bin wan atis jes we dɛn bin want fɔ chenj di we aw wi de si wi ples na di wɔl. Dɛn nɔ bin de diploy am kɔrɛkt wan. Pan ɔl we i nɔ ɛva opin lɛk aw dɛn mek am, i bin mek pipul dɛn tɔk bɔt impɔtant tin dɛn ɛn i bin mek pipul dɛn we de stɔdi bɔt di sta dɛn, sayɛnsman dɛn, midia ɔltɛm, ticha dɛn, studɛnt dɛn, ɛn ɔlman na di wɔl bin ansa wit ɔl dɛn at, ɛn dis bin sho se fɔ mek art wok fayn nɔ nid fɔ gɛt sakrifays pan tɛknikal tin dɛn.
orbitalReflector.caption: Dijital Rɛndaring fɔ Ɔrbital Riflɛkta, 2018

others.text: Bɔku ɔda atis dɛn dɔn ɛp fɔ du di wok we dɛn de du fɔ mek spɛshal at, ɛn ɛni wan pan dɛn dɔn briŋ difrɛn we dɛn fɔ si tin dɛn we dɛn de du risach. Notabl projɛkt dɛm inklud Sarah Jane Pell in astronaut artist risach we de ɛksplɔrɔ mɔtalman pefɔmɛns na ekstrim envayrɔmɛnt; Agnes Meyer-Brandis in Moon Goose Analogue projɛkt we de ɛgzamin istri ɛn kɔntempɔral spɛs ɛksplɔrɔshɔn narratives; Nahum in AstroArts program we de mek am izi fɔ du atis maykrograviti ɛkspiriɛns; ɛn Arthur Woods in Cosmic Dancer skapul, we na di fɔs skapul we dɛn sho na spes na di Mir steshɔn insay 1993.

orbitalTemple.text: Insay 2025 , afta 4 ia we dɛn dɔn du risach ɛn divɛlɔpmɛnt, Brazilian atis Edson Pavoni ɛn wan grup we gɛt bɔku difrɛn wok dɛn we de wok wit am go lanch Orbital Temple , we na wan patisipetiv art sataylayt we de invayt ɛnibɔdi na di wɔl fɔ sɛn nem to ɔbit, we go mek wan radikal inkluziv mɛmorial biyɔn bɔda.
orbitalTemple.caption: Orbital Tempul na di Mercosul Bienal. Fɔto: Klara Maks

imageAlts.leonov: Alexei Leonov in drɔin ɛn pensil dɛn
imageAlts.moonMuseumWarhol: Moon Museum seramik wef we de sho ɔl di art wok dɛn
imageAlts.fallenAstronaut: Fɔl Astronaut mɛmorial na di Mun
imageAlts.artsatArt: Artwok we dɛn mek frɔm ARTSAT-1 data
imageAlts.enoch: Tavares Strachan in ENOCH displei yunit
